definition: to be pestered beyond endurance
(negative prefix)/not/no

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy

sentences.english: You have been on my ass ever since New York.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约的时候你就已经让我不胜其烦了。

sentences.english: She was tired of answering these puerile questions.
sentences.chinese: 她回答这些幼稚的问题觉得不胜其烦。

definition: unable to put up with (sth) any longer
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
without end/incessantly/on and on
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
lit. badly burned about the head (from trying to put out a fire) (idiom)/fig. hard-pressed/under pressure (from a heavy workload, creditors etc)
to struggle to cope (with a situation)/to be at one's wits' end
to suffer unspeakable misery/indescribably painful/hellish
(coll.) to feel as though one's head could explode (Tw)
pinyin: yi1 ge5 tou2 liang3 ge5 da4

definition: over and over again (idiom)
to feel agitated/to be troubled/to be annoyed/an upset or distraction
not to mind taking all the trouble (idiom)/to take great pains/to be very patient
lit. twice then three times (idiom); fig. repeatedly/over and over again
more than one can bear (idiom); at the end of one's patience/the last straw
physically and emotionally exhausted
lit. belly full of complaints (idiom)/discontent/always moaning and complaining
